WorkItem.ClosedComment: Likely a transient network issue. We haven't done anything with the file - might be a download center problem. Please reactivate if you see weirdness again.
WorkItem.Description:
Just spent the last hour trying to figure this out...

This morning I installed the 0.8.1 MSI on my wks and win server 2008 r2 dev servers without an issue.

This afternoon I pulled down the msi to my win server 2008 r2 VM - and it gave the error "The package cannot be installed". After much hair pulling I discovered the byte count of the file pulled down this afternoon is 4880892 wheras the size of the files this morning is 4939776. So its possible that there is a but msi out there?

I tries pulling down again to a different machine and the bad fine came down.

Any ideas.

Thanks

Donal
